tool_description: World wide zip code or postal code search API
name: Zipcode API World wide search
title: Zipcode API World wide search

api_list.name: Postalcodepairswithinadistance
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of matched postal code pairs that are within a given distance to each other.

api_list.name: Postalcodetolocationinformation
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to receive information for one or multiple given postal codes.

api_list.name: Isemaildisposable
Postalcodeswithinaradius
api_list.description: This endpoint will convert a list of submitted postal codes into a list of postal code pairs that are located within given distance to each other.

api_list.name: Postalcodesbycity
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of postal codes based on a city.

optional_parameters.name: state_name
optional_parameters.description: (optional) name of the province. List of provinces for a country can be retrieved using our province endpoint

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: (optional) limit the number of results returned

api_list.name: Accountstatus
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zipcode-api-world-wide-search.p.rapidapi.com/version/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zipcode-api-world-wide-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zipcode-api-world-wide-search.p.rapidapi.com/{version}/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zipcode-api-world-wide-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Distancecalculationbetweenpostalcodes
api_list.description: Conducts a worldwide postal code search for the code 51503

api_list.name: Validphonenumber
Postalcodesbystate
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of postal codes based on a state.

api_list.name: Provinces/statesofacountry
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of postal codes based on a state.
